text: Patriarch John X may refer to: * John X bar Mawdyono, Syriac Patriarch of Antioch in 1129–1137 * John X of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch in 1198–1206 * Pope John X of Alexandria, Pope of Alexandria & Patriarch of the See of St. Mark in 1363–1369 * John X, 55th Maronite Patriarch in 1648–1656 * Patriarch John X of Antioch (ruled since 2012)
title: Patriarch John X
